  },
  hi: {

export function getText(key, lang = 'en') {
  var _TRANSLATIONS$lang;
  return ((_TRANSLATIONS$lang = TRANSLATIONS[lang]) === null || _TRANSLATIONS$lang === void 0 ? void 0 : _TRANSLATIONS$lang[key]) || TRANSLATIONS.en[key] || key;
}

sourcesContent:
// Multilingual translations - All Major Indian Languages
// Supports: English, Hindi, Bengali, Telugu, Marathi, Tamil, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Punjabi, Odia

export const LANGUAGES = [
    { code: 'en', name: 'English', nativeName: 'English' },
    { code: 'hi', name: 'Hindi', nativeName: 'हिन्दी' },
    { code: 'bn', name: 'Bengali', nativeName: 'বাংলা' },
    { code: 'te', name: 'Telugu', nativeName: 'తెలుగు' },

    { code: 'pa', name: 'Punjabi', nativeName: 'ਪੰਜਾਬੀ' },
    { code: 'or', name: 'Odia', nativeName: 'ଓଡ଼ିଆ' },
];

export function getText(key, lang = 'en') {
    return TRANSLATIONS[lang]?.[key] || TRANSLATIONS.en[key] || key;
}
